What is the recommended approach to using a published scenario?
Leaf through the scenario to gain an overview of the chapters and contents, then read the whole document thoroughly from cover to cover once.

What should be done after reading the whole document once?
Work through the scenario again, this time taking notes, and try to write a bare minimum.

What should be avoided when taking notes?
Superfluous detail or things that you feel confident that you’ll remember.
